ygData.subject: Qeynos Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: I am an Innoruuk worshipping Shadowknight so I am not particularly welcomed in Qeynos (um, does this have anything to do with the 20 or so guards I have
ygData.messageBody:
I am an Innoruuk worshipping Shadowknight so I am not particularly welcomed
in Qeynos (um, does this have anything to do with the 20 or so guards I have
killed? Heh) but I was wondering, do all the Grimrot quests originate in
Qeynos, or can I just talk to Grimrot himself? I'm currently in S Karana
anyways, but can't ever seem to catch him. I have no idea who this Arlena is
but I hope to find out soon if I can ever catch this guy. :)

How many SK quests are there in Qeynos and are there any that are worth it?

Thanks,
Virten
Human SK of Neriak, 21st training
